content.title: Configuring Actions for onMapping
content.body:
1. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Condition section, select If.
  2. From the right pane of the Action Editor, under Add Condition provide the following values:
    • First field – Value
    • Second field: Recipients.opstatus
    • Third field: Equals
    • Fourth field: Value
    • Fifth field: 0
  3. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Mapping section, select Add Mapping.
    The Mapping Editor window appears.
